thread.title: Steelers rally behind backup Jones, stun Cardinals 25-13
thread.title_full: Steelers rally behind backup Jones, stun Cardinals 25-13

title: Steelers rally behind backup Jones, stun Cardinals 25-13
text:
> Top News Steelers rally behind backup Jones, stun Cardinals 25-13 Pittsburgh Steelers defensive end Cameron Heyward (97) has his father's nickname on his eyeblack as he sits on the bench during an NFL football game against the Arizona Cardinals, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015, in Pittsburgh. Heyward was reprimanded for wearing it in an earlier game. (AP Photo/Don Wright)
